title: How  can I enable the DHCP server again if I disable it and can't log in the management page through the default IP address 192.168.1.1?
answer:
You have two ways to restore it, and then log in the management page to enable DHCP server:
a) Modify the IP address of the local computer as a static IP which stands the same segment with the one of gateway. the default IP is 192.168.1.1, so you can modify it as follows:
IP address: 192.168.1.100
Subnet mask: 255.255.255.0
Default gateway: 192.168.1.1
DNS primary address: 192.168.1.1
b) Restore factory default.
